request.description: If username or email is already registered, the API will return 400 Bad Request.
After user sign-up, the API will send an email to user that contains verification code. Then input the verification code to this endpoint to activate the account.

response.name: 200 Success

request.description: User login with this endpoint, the API will return access token as Bearer Token. User isn't verified need to be verified first using "Email Verification" endpoint
User can change his password using this endpoint. Make sure the current password is correct.
User can update his Fullname or Bio using this endpoint. Please remove the json key if don't want to be updated.

response.name: 201 Success

request.description: On login user will get access_token as Bearer token which will expire in 30 days. Before it expires, user can generate a new access_token using the current token.
User can change his profile picture using this endpoint.

response.name: 200 Success

request.description: Get list of supported social media.

response.name: 200 Success

request.description: To create social media link, set type_id value using the entries value from "Get Social Media Link Types" endpoint.

response.name: 400 Social Media Registered
400 Username Or LInk Format Invalid

request.description: This endpoint is used to get all social media links that have been registered.

response.name: 200 Success

query.description: start date range, max 30 days before current date
